W03_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: On the other side of the door lies a land shrouded in darkness. Perhaps Dolores can lead you to the cat you seek.

W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You've found your cat. Time to head back to Miyako City.

W03_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You've found your cat. Time to head back to Miyako City.

W03_EVAR_AMYA_WELL_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_AMYA_WELL_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You've found your cat. Time to head back to Miyako City.

W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110_DET.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110_DET.text: Dolores has become the ruler of Yomi. She says you can find a cat if you defeat her in battle. Could that really be the case?
